overview: Ashlyn and Steve are phone sex buddies. And like a lot of phone sex buddies, things change when they meet.  Animal urges come out. Animal instincts take hold. And as the viewer, you take hold too.  Welcome to Judy Blue's awesome aural obsession, Animal Instinct. Where the tiger in Ashlyn comes out in the strangest places. On a phone. In your ear. And in your face. Animal Instinct. Grrrreat!
title: Animal Instinct
